choices.label: The figure presents a graph in the first quadrant of the coordinate plane. The horizontal axis is labeled r, and a vertical line labeled uppercase R intersects the horizontal axis at a point halfway across the axis and extends upwards to a point three quarters of the way up the vertical axis. The vertical axis is unlabeled, and a point labeled B is located three quarters of the way up the axis. The data represented in the graph are as follows. The line begins on the vertical axis, at the point labeled B and moves horizontally to the right until reaching the top of the vertical line labeled R. It then curves downwards and to the right with a decreasing rate, ending at the rightmost point along the horizontal axis and near the bottom of the vertical axis.
